simple.title: Time Series Pie Chart
simple.text:
This is a new visualization of pie chart which shows data changes over time.

Dataset: The graph shows the number of each types of house sold from year 2007 to 2012

simple.title: Current Year Label
simple.text:
This is a bar chart showing data for vaccinated people.

Your turn: Once again, you can hover over a bar to see the data for the corresponding week.

That's it, have fun exploring the data!

simple.title: Current Selected Year
simple.text:
This is the year of the current visualization.

all the data from current year are shaded

simple.title: One Category Over Time
simple.text:
This is the information visualization of 3 bedrooms sold.

Each arc contains the year houses were sold and total revenue of that year

the area of each arc is porportional to each other arcs.

You can compare the area to visualize the difference in revenue of different types of houses in different years

simple.title: Hover on Arc
simple.text:
To know more information of a specific category of a year, hover on the arc you want to know more about

In this case, the tooltip suggests that in the year 2012, 3% of the total house sold was 1 bedroom houses, there was only 1 bedroom house sold in 2012, and it was sold for 52.7k

simple.title: Click on Arc
simple.text:
Click on an arc with different year than the current year allows the visualization transform into the selected year.

Click on the arc to change from 2007 to 2012

simple.title: Double Click on Arc to Compare
simple.text: To compare all the current year's arc, double click on the arc you want to compare, all the arcs will be aligned on baseline for better visualiation

simple.title: Double Click Again on Arc to reset
simple.text:
To go back to the original view, simply double click on the same arc again

Single click on any other year's arc would automatically reset as well

simple.title: Legends
simple.text: Here are the list of category for the house data

simple.title: Click on Legend
simple.text:
You can click on any category to go to the earliest timestamp where the category appears

In this case, click on 2 bedroom label would allow you to go to 2008's visualization (as 2 bedroom houses were first sold in 2008)
